description: FuelEasy is a mobile application that allows users to order fuel delivery to their location conveniently.

features.name: Order Fuel
features.description: Users can place orders for fuel delivery specifying the type and quantity of fuel they need.

features.name: Location Tracking
features.description: The app utilizes GPS to track the user's location and provide accurate delivery services.

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Users can pay for fuel orders securely within the app using various payment methods.

features.name: Order History
features.description: Users can view their order history to track previous transactions and fuel consumption.

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Users receive real-time notifications regarding order status, delivery updates, and promotional offers.
